CustomField.description: SOQL query to be used to determine which are the users that will be assigned to this product license. This query can take in consideration a number of factors, such as profile, permission set assignments and other user characteristics.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: SOQL query to be used to determine which are the users that will be assigned to this product license. This query can take in consideration a number of factors, such as profile, permission set assignments and other user characteristics.
CustomField.label: Query
